alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:05PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mason, east central Cabell, northwestern Kanawha and central Putnam Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hurricane, or 9 miles southwest of Winfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Winfield, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Milton, Eleanor, Poca, Cross Lanes, Culloden, Institute, Tornado, Teays Valley, Alum Creek and Bancroft. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 25 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
